item.description:
Hi - This is not a Wedeln Ski and Outdoors club sponsored event - but many of us are going to support our friends at Jay Peak.

Jay Peak Video would like to personally invite all Wedeln Ski and Outdoors club meetup members to our release of Will Work For Powder. The event is on December 20th at the Greatest Bar on Friend St. in Boston. $7 at the door and the show starts right at 7:00pm. The Greatest Bar is located across from the New Boston Garden.

Please check us out at www.jaypeakvideo.com

Hope to see you there!
Jonathan
item.name: Jay Peak Video: Will Work for Powder 12/20
